title: Silent Hill 2.5 fangame with Oculus Rift DK2
description:
Description
"You appear as Heather at the same place where James in sh2 went to the city, while you browse through location you met Valtiel which tries to open gateway to second part of map for you, in order for him to do it you must collect bunnies scattered all over map, the more bunnies you pick up the more monsters come at you. When you pick up all bunnies you run to the final door and part2 starts. Also during final run to the end Alessa appears and shows you the direction you should go towards the end.
The events of this game happen after Silent Hill 3, when Heather tries to leave Silent Hill but for some reason she must go back to it."
Minimal sys requirements is windows 7, dx11 gpu(gt 560 or 660 or 760 or 960, it may work even on low-end gt730 if you tune down the graphics)
If you don't have oculus rift disable it in main menu. Also you can skip first graveyard and forest level since there are no monsters in it(unless you are a SH2 fan) either by selecting it in menu or pressing 1.

Troubleshoot:

please use short path with no spaces like c:sh25 or c:gamessh25 otherwise game might not work

if you get an error Unable To Init Audio - you need to set quality of your primary playback device from studio quality to dvd quality.(right click on sound->playback devices->look here for default device->double click on it->advanced->default format->make sure it's 16bit 44100hz(CD) or 16bit(48000) DVD

if upon loading resources game crashes try to install/re-install DirectX redistributable from june 2010
